name: Chytrid
description:
CHYTRID is an interactive mystery short story. Play as a frog detective apprentice who justed moved in to an unnamed town - interrogate other frogs, make your own hypotheses, and try to solve the mystery as it unfolds right before your eyes. Who's behind the tragic events occuring seemingly every night? The police? The elites? God? Find out in a less-than-an-hour story.

Erizux: instagram erizux.dev

Adam Morton: https://adammortonmusic.com/
